summary.title: Summary
summary.text: Quality Assurance Engineer with 3+ years of hands-on experience building automated test suites in JavaScript. Skilled in Cypress, Selenium, and Playwright, with proven success migrating manual test processes to automationâ€”delivering measurable improvements in coverage and efficiency. Strong collaborator who bridges QA, development, and product teams to ship reliable software.

jobDetails: Built and maintained E2E, functional and regression test suites using Selenium in a UNIX environment
Helped lead migration of 200+ test cases to Qase.io using Javascript and Bash scripting, improving regression coverage by 15% and accelerating manual-to-automation handoffs
Provided manual testing for mobile app/devices for iOS users as needed
Partnered with product, development, and QA teams to align test strategies with release goals
Developed comprehensive E2E and API test automation using Cypress, reducing regression testing and catching defects earlier in the development cycle
Validated backend systems through MySQL queries and orchestrated test runs using Bash scripts
Owned weekly QA dashboards tracking test results, defect trends and release readiness metrics
Led  cross-functional demos to train non-technical teams on new features and product functionality
Contributed bug fixes to the PHP codebase and managed test documentation in Jira and Testrail
Tools: GitLab, AWS Device Farm (iOS/Android), OAuth, Okta, CI/CD pipelines

skills.toolsAndPlatforms: Postman, Docker, AWS, Jira, Confluence, TestRail, Qase.io, Git, Ninety
skills.other: React, Express, MySQL, CI/CD, REST APIs
